Justin Raimondo (Onye amụrụ Dennis Raimondo;  n'ọnwa November 18, 1951 ̊ June 27, 2019) bụ onye edemede America na onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Antiwar.com. Ọ kọwara onwe ya dị ka "onye na-agbaso omenala-paleo-libertarian".
A mụrụ ya na White Plains, New York, Raimondo na ezinụlọ ya kwagara Yorktown Heights, New York mgbe ọ dị obere
Raimondo kọwara onwe ya dị ka "nwatakịrị ọjọọ"; iji gbochie onwe ya n'ụzọ a, ọ nọrọ otu afọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ Jesuit na-elekọta na ugwu New York.
N'oge a, o nwere mmasị na nkà ihe ọmụma Ayn Rand nke Objectivism. O mechara sonye na Young Americans for Freedom
N'afọ ndị 1970, ọ malitere ịrụsi ọrụ ike na Libertarian Party

Ọ "esonyeere òtù ahụ n'afọ 1974, ma na-arụsi ọrụ ike na mkpọsa onye isi ala nke Roger MacBride n'afọ 1976, nke abụọ nke LP na White House bid". Ọ bịara na-agbachitere ọgba aghara White Night, nke sochiri ikpe igbu ọchụ nke Dan White (maka ọnwụ nke onye nlekọta San Francisco Harvey Milk na Onye isi obodo George Moscone).
N'afọ 1983, mgbe nkewa n'ime Libertarian Party gasịrị, Raimondo hapụrụ òtù ahụ ma gbalịa ịhazi otu òtù nnwere onwe na Republican Party nke a maara dị ka Kọmitii Nhazi Libertarian Republican
Mgbe 1989, Raimondo malitere ọzọ iso Rothbard na-arụ ọrụ na ndị na-emegide agha, onye na-agbaso omenala John Randolph Club, akụkụ nke Rockford Institute.
